basics.name: Ellie Ishii
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.A. in Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2026. As of now, I am working towards getting into the Web Developement field.

activities.organization: Member of the PANDA (Programming and Algorithms) Club
activities.summary: Collaborated with peers in PANDA to strengthen problem-solving skills through weekly coding challenges
